com.totsp.gwittir.client.beans
Interface Introspector

public interface Introspector

The Introspector allows property inspection of Bean-Type classes marked with the Introspectable interface.

Author:
Robert "kebernet" Cooper

Field Summary
static Introspector INSTANCE
          The Singleton instance of the Introspector you should use from your classes.
 
Method Summary
 BeanDescriptor getDescriptor(java.lang.Object object)
          Gets the BeanDescriptor for an object.
 java.lang.Class resolveClass(java.lang.Object instance)
          Resolves an object to its most specific Introspectable type.
 

Field Detail

INSTANCE

static final Introspector INSTANCE
The Singleton instance of the Introspector you should use from your classes.

Method Detail

getDescriptor

BeanDescriptor getDescriptor(java.lang.Object object)
Gets the BeanDescriptor for an object.

Parameters:
object - Object to introspect.
Returns:
BeanDescriptor for the object.

resolveClass

java.lang.Class resolveClass(java.lang.Object instance)
Resolves an object to its most specific Introspectable type.

Parameters:
instance - Instance of an object
Returns:
Class literal for the most specific Introspectable type.
